• Example
  • Constructor
  • Options
  • Method
Example

{{ now }} -> "%Y - %m - %d" -> {{ now2 }}

{{ now }} -> "%B %A, %Y" -> {{ now3 }}

{{ now }} -> "%x %X" -> {{ now4 }}

{{ justAgo }} -> nice() -> {{ justAgo2 }}

{{ minuteAgo }} -> nice() -> {{ minuteAgo2 }}

{{ hourAgo }} -> nice() -> {{ hourAgo2 }}

{{ yesterday }} -> nice() -> {{ yesterday2 }}

{{ morethan }} -> nice() -> {{ morethan2 }}



Constructor

$.dateutil( [value], [options] )

value - String/Date

options - Object

define( [ "util/dateutil" ], function() { "use strict"; angular .module( "demo.dateutil", [] ) .controller( "dateutilController", [ "$scope", function( $scope ) { console.log( $.dateutil().val( new Date() ).format( "%Y - %d / %m" ) ); } ] ); } );


Options

format - "%Y-%m-%d"

%a - Abbreviated weekday name

%A - Full weekday name

%b - Abbreviated month name

%B - Full month name

%c - Date and time, as "%a %b %e %H:%M:%S %Y"

%d - Zero-padded day of the month as a decimal number[01, 31]

%e - Space-padded day of the month as a decimal number [1, 31]

%H - Hour(24-hour clock) as decimal number[00, 23]

%I - Hour(12-hour clock) as a decimal number[01, 12]

%j - Day of the year as a decimal number[001, 366]

%m - Month as a decimal number[01, 12]

%M - Minute as a decimal number[00, 59]

%L - Milliseconds as a decimal number[000, 999]

%p - Either AM or PM

%S - Second as a decimal number[00, 59]

%U - Week nunber of the year(Sunday as the first day of the week) as a decimal number[00, 53]

%w - Weekday as a decimal number[0(Sunday), 6]

%x - Date, as "%m/%d/%Y"

%X - Time, as "%H:%M:%S"

%y - Year without century as a decimal number[00, 99]

%Y - Year with century as a decimal number

%Z - Tiem zone offset, such as "-0700"

% - A literal "%" character

默认日期格式化, See Python Date Format


abbreviatedWeekdayName - [ "Sun", "Mon", "Tues", "Wed", "Thur", "Fri", "Sat" ]

星期简写


weekdayName - [ "Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Satruday" ]

星期全称


abbreviatedMonthName - [ "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sept", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec" ]

月份简写


monthName - [ "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December" ]

月份全称



Method

nice() - 语义化时间输出


monday( [ format ] )

format - String

返回星期一


tuesday( [ format ] )

format - String

返回星期二


wednesday( [ format ] )

format - String

返回星期三


thursday( [ format ] )

format - String

返回星期四


friday( [ format ] )

format - String

返回星期五


saturday( [ format ] )

format - String

返回星期六


sunday( [ format ] )

format - String

返回星期日


yesterday( [ format ] )

format - String

返回昨天


tomorrow( [ format ] )

format - String

返回明天


lastWeek( [ format ] )

format - String

返回上星期的今天


nextWeek( [ format ] )

format - String

返回下星期的今天


month( value )

value - Number

相对单位为月的时间偏移, 返回Date类型, eg: month( -1 ), 返回上月的日期


week( value )

value - Number

相对单位为星期的时间偏移


day( value )

value - Number

相对单位为天的时间偏移
